posts.post_title: FS: 1887 Tobin Litho Cap Anson PSA
posts.post_content:
Hey All,

Looking to move this awesome Anson.

PSA Authentic Altered. It has been trimmed. Still, it presents extremely well! Color is just super cool! And super low “pop” at psa if that is your thing! Super rare. Only 3 total graded at PSA.

Looking for [STRIKE]$800 $600[/STRIKE] $550 Shipped PayPal F&F.

Will ship in the AM. 

Thanks!
